      Range 0 to 100 Unit Relative Humidity [uom id=22]
    Occupancy [id=GV1]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        No [0]
        Yes [1]
        NA [2]
    Responding [id=GV2]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]

USER QUERY: When occupancy in Carls Jr becomes "Yes" on weekdays between 07:00 and 09:00, set Ecobee - 697 Dining to Heat and set the heat setpoint to 70°F.
